segments.text: Good morning , sir . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good day . I ’ m looking for a one-bedroom apartment today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . How much rent did you want to pay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I didn ’ t want to pay more than $ 900 a month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: $ 900 a month ? We don ’ t often have apartment as inexpensive as that . We have one apartment for $ 985 a month today , on Eleventh Avenue . It ’ s near the municipal buildings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it ’ s unfurnished . It has a kitchen , but there are not many cookers . There ’ s a garden in the back , but the tenants can ’ t use it . The landlord lives downstairs . Friends are forbidden in the apartment after midnight . No noise and no television after 11 ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you ! I want to take an apartment , not a prison .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , we would do as your requirement . And we ’ ll contact with you later !
segments.speaker: S1
